text: Dervaig () is a small village on the Isle of Mull off the west coast of Scotland. The village is within the parish of Kilninian and Kilmore, and is situated on the B8073. The church is by Glasgow architect Peter MacGregor Chalmers with stained glass by Stephen Adam.http://www.victorianweb.org/art/stainedglass/adam/gailbraith.html ==References== ==External links== *Canmore - Mull, Cnoc Fada, Dervaig site record *Canmore - Mull, Dervaig, Kilmore Parish Church site record Category:Villages on the Isle of Mull
title: Dervaig
